channel.title: Lab People on Marine Macroecology and Biogeochemistry Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Lab People on Marine Macroecology and Biogeochemistry Lab

item.title: Summer students working in the lab
item.description: Sally Faulkner, Matt Fyfe, Akarsh Pai, and Catherine Fiset are summer research students working in the lab this summer. They are all busy growing cultures, performing assays, and helping out with lots of tasks around the lab. This week Sally and Matt got a fun day at the beach to collect seawater for their lab cultures. Even indoor lab scientists need to get some sun now and then!
